experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: Enhanced Cafe ETA Accuracy and Reduced Order Loss Through Advanced Forecasting and Logic Implementation • Developed a cutting-edge Rider Attainment Forecast model for Last Mile to address the challenge of order loss due to rider unavailability • Derived the logic for forecasting model using the historical data trends, implemented the model with a 3% reduction in overall order loss • Collaborated with the Cafe and Product team for deriving the ETA logic for cafe orders(10% slab), utilized SQL, python for logic derivation • Implemented ETA logic led to an impressive 18% reduction in breached orders,with a reduction of 10% in EOB5+ and 2% in EOB5- orders
experience.description_html: Enhanced Cafe ETA Accuracy and Reduced Order Loss Through Advanced Forecasting and Logic Implementation • Developed a cutting-edge Rider Attainment Forecast model for Last Mile to address the challenge of order loss due to rider unavailability • Derived the logic for forecasting model using the historical data trends, implemented the model with a 3% reduction in overall order loss • Collaborated with the Cafe and Product team for deriving the ETA logic for cafe orders(10% slab), utilized SQL, python for logic derivation • Implemented ETA logic led to an impressive 18% reduction in breached orders,with a reduction of 10% in EOB5+ and 2% in EOB5- orders

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: Optimized Marketing Strategies and Profitability by Analyzing Customer Behavior, Expanding ROI, and Streamlining Sales Channels• Proposed a strategic plan to enhance the company's Return on Ad Spend, delivering a remarkable increase of 2.3% in the ROAS value• Generated comprehensive sales reports for diverse revenue channels (offline & e-commerce) and analysed the logistics, delivery expenses • Investigated the annual sales and purchase data of the company to improve the profit margins by 17% on the top-selling products
experience.description_html: Optimized Marketing Strategies and Profitability by Analyzing Customer Behavior, Expanding ROI, and Streamlining Sales Channels• Proposed a strategic plan to enhance the company's Return on Ad Spend, delivering a remarkable increase of 2.3% in the ROAS value• Generated comprehensive sales reports for diverse revenue channels (offline & e-commerce) and analysed the logistics, delivery expenses • Investigated the annual sales and purchase data of the company to improve the profit margins by 17% on the top-selling products

experience.title: Department Representative
experience.description: • Part of 51 member team that coordinated with HR team of various companies to execute placement & internship drive for 3000+ students • Collectively Placed 1700+ students (highest across all IITs; 40%YoY growth), achieved 800+ intern offers (highest till date; 51%YoY growth) • Received record-breaking 1000+ offers in 3 days (fastest across all IITs); POC for 25+ firms visiting for placement drive in first phase • Held a central role in organizing data for over 3000 participating students; handled the scheduling, execution of 20+ internship drives

experience.title: General Secretary Technology
experience.description: • Structured and managed an annual budget of INR 0.8 lakh (23% YoY growth) for hall technology events for the academic session 2021-22 • Managed a team of 8 captains, 3 secretaries to facilitate active participation from 200+ students in various Inter-Hall Technology events • Conducted a series of 5 Intra-Hall event, including quizzes, case study, data analytics; workshop for product design & hardware modelling
